      Similar to negate() in that the original coordinates of this location are takes and are converted to their negatives.

      Return a new Location the coordinates of which are the reciprocals of the appropriate coordinates in this Location.
      Location Rectangle.getSize() 
      static Location Location.parseLocation(java.lang.String string)
      Takes in a String object that was produced as a result of calling the toString() method of this class and converts it to and returns a new Location object the coordinates of which are read from the String.
      Methods in com.spartanlaboratories.measurements with parameters of type Location 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Location.change(Location locChange)
      Changes the coordinates of this location by the values stored in the location given as a parameter.
      void Location.copyTo(Location element)
      Makes the coordinate values of the passed in location match those of this location.
      void Location.duplicate(Location location)
      Sets the coordinates of the location to match those of the given location.
      boolean Location.equals(Location comparedLocation)
      Checks whether the coordinates of this location are the same as those of the given location.
      double Location.getDegreeFromFulcrum(Location location)
      Using (0,0) as the center of an angle and this and the passed in Location as the other two points this method returns the degree of the angle formed by the three points.
      boolean Location.isGreaterThan(Location comparedLocation)
      Checks and returns whether or not each of this location's coordinates is greater than the coordinates of the specified location.
      boolean Location.isGreaterThanOrEqualTo(Location comparedLocation)
      Checks and returns whether or not each of this location's coordinates is greater than or equal to the coordinates of the specified location.
      boolean Location.isLessThan(Location comparedLocation)
      Checks and returns whether or not each of this location's coordinates is less than the coordinates of the specified location.
      boolean Location.isLessThanOrEqualTo(Location comparedLocation)
      Checks and returns whether or not each of this location's coordinates is less than or equal to the coordinates of the specified location.
      void Location.magnify(Location amplification)
      Multiplies the coordinates of this Location by the corresponding coordinates in the passed in location.
      void Location.revert(Location previousChange)
      Changes the coordinates of the current location by the negatives of the coordinates of the passed in location.
